text:
A bug I noticed for the link field type in tandem with new Popup CTAs...
This is a copied snippet from a module link field. Actions > copy snippet. (this feature is SO helpful!)

But when I select a Popup CTA in the page editor as the link type, this HubSpot provided snippet will not work to render a link to open Popup properly

I removed the |escape_url filter and now it works. It seems that this automatically generated snippet has not been tested properly with the new Popup CTAs feature. The |escape_url filter removes the javascript required by HubSpot tracking to properly render the CTA
Hi! Does anyone have guidance on how to hide the decimals in the price field of the line items module in a custom quote template? It is just taking up too much space
